/**
 *  ICU <specials> source: <path>/xml/main/uz_Arab.xml
 */
uz_Arab{
    %%ParentIsRoot:int{1}
    AuxExemplarCharacters{"[\u200C \u200D]"}
    ExemplarCharacters{
        "[\u064B \u064C \u064D \u064E \u064F \u0650 \u0651 \u0652 \u0654 \u0670 ء آ أ"
        " ؤ ئ ا ب پ ة ت ث ټ ج چ ح خ ځ څ د ذ ډ ر ز ړ ږ ژ س ش ښ ص ض ط ظ ع غ ف ق ک ګ گ ل"
        " م ن ڼ ه و ۇ ۉ ي ی ۍ ې]"
    }
    LocaleScript{
        "Arab",
    }
    NumberElements{
        arabext{
            symbols{
                decimal{"٫"}
                exponential{"×۱۰^"}
                group{"٬"}
                percentSign{"٪"}
            }
        }
        default{"arabext"}
        latn{
            symbols{
                decimal{","}
                group{"."}
                minusSign{"−"}
            }
        }
    }
    Version{"2.0.50.30"}
    layout{
        characters{"right-to-left"}
        lines{"top-to-bottom"}
    }
}
